original_title: ハヤテのごとく!×神のみぞ知るセカイ・ジョイントコンサート2013 『本日、満開桜色!』
overview: A live event by the performers of the TV animation "Hayate the Combat Butler!" And "The World God Only Knows" conducted on April 21, 2013 at the Pacifico Yokohama National National Convention Hall.
title: Hayate the Combat Butler × The World God Only Knows· Joint Concert 2013 "Today, full bloom Sakura color!"
